article.Heading: Mega GST overhaul: GST standalone restaurants at 5%
article.Summary: There has been a huge debate on whether or not restaurants have been passing on GST rate cut benefits to consumers or not. To discuss this, CNBC-TV18 caught up with Rohan Shah, Tax Expert, Pratik Jain, Partner at PwC India, Adarsh Shetty, President of Indian Hotel and Restaurant Association and Rahul Singh, Vice President and Gurgaon Chapter Head of National Restaurant Association OF India.
article.Body:
There has been a huge debate on whether or not restaurants have been passing on GST rate cut benefits to consumers or not. To discuss this, CNBC-TV18 caught up with Rohan Shah, Tax Expert, Pratik Jain, Partner at PwC India, Adarsh Shetty, President of Indian Hotel and Restaurant Association and Rahul Singh, Vice President and Gurgaon Chapter Head of National Restaurant Association OF India.
